Mayo Host is fast & affordable web hosting provider. Over the span of last few years we have expanded our product range to cover all hosting products ranging from simple web hosting to enterprise level VPS and dedicated servers. We offer exceptional customer support and guarantee 99% uptime. Today we bring our web hosting plans with 30% recurring discount.

Special Features
*CloudLinux
*Huge Storage Plans
*99% Uptime Guarantee
*Free Websites Migration
*Mulitiple PHPs Available
*DirectAdmin Control Panel
*Softaculous: Automatic WordPress Installation
*and much more…
